flavorText:
"Do you thirst for knowledge no matter the cost?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

foreignData.flavorText: „Dürstet es dich nach Wissen, unabhängig vom Preis?" —Watnik, Glasbläsermeister
foreignData.name: Dunkelwasser-Ei
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, opfere das Dunkelwasser-Ei: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U}{B}. Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Ansías el conocimiento sin importar el precio?" —Wátnik, soplavidrio experto

foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar el Huevo Aguanegra: Agrega {U}{B} a tu reserva de maná. Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Êtes-vous prêt à payer le prix de la puissance ? » —Warnik, maître souffleur de verre.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vuoi accumulare conoscenza senza preoccuparti delle conseguenze?" —Watnik, mastro vetraio

foreignData.name: ダークウォーターの卵

foreignData.flavorText: "Tens sede de conhecimento não importa a que custo?" — Watnik, mestre vidreiro
foreignData.name: Ovo de Darkwater

name: Darkwater Egg
originalText:
o2, oc
T, Sacrifice Darkwater Egg: Add o
Uo
B to your mana pool. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.

text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Darkwater Egg: Add {U}{B}. Draw a card.
